entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump @CardinalDolan @StPatsNYC Hey Donnie, I see Alex Azar's removal is just a deflection away from your incompetent handling of the Coronavirus Pandemic. He is being made the fall guy in the blame game. You are so incompetent, no matter what you do, you won't get the confidence of the American public.
